Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the presence of Pakistani/Islamic flags at Rahul Gandhi's rally by stating that there are more Islamic flags than Indian flags.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove the presence of Pakistani/Islamic flags at the rally.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the presence of green-colored flags represents Pakistani/Islamic flags, when in fact they represent the flag of the Indian Union Muslim League (IUML).
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the green-colored flags seen in the video are not Pakistani flags but the IUML flags.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the green-colored flags seen at the rally are not Islamic flags but the flags of the IUML.
